revised_title: Isotope Shift and Hyperfine Structure in the Spectrum of Tin: A Study of Tin Isotopes
tldr: This study measures isotope shifts and hyperfine structure in the spectrum of tin using the line 3283 A. The shifts between all even tin isotopes were measured interferometrically, along with some measurements for odd isotopes. The results were compared with previous work on other tin lines to obtain accurate values of the volume shift constant and calculate configuration mixing in the levels studied.
